tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RFID_Inventory_Tracking (
  tag_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  product_id UUID,
  quantity INT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE RFID_Events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE Item_Tracking (
    track_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    track_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    track_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE RFID_Data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  tag_id VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);
